title: Early Morning of the Living Dead
description: When Charlotte Stevens went to interview the mysterious Spencer Blake, owner and CEO of Blake Tech, she thought it'd be a quick visit. They'd have a pleasant chat, briefly discuss his current projects, and maybe touch on his connection to the disappearance of a local history professor.You know. Basic interview stuff.What Charlotte hadn't counted on were the zombies.Now trapped, Charlotte has to work with a man she can't trust against creatures that want to eat them alive.
author: F. Larson
